tables.message_conversation:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_message_conversation` (
  `conversation_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT '',
  `from_id` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `to_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `last_message_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT '0',
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`conversation_id`),
  KEY `from_id` (`from_id`,`to_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.message_message:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_message_message` (
  `message_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `type_id` enum('message','group','chat') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'message',
  `reply_message_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'used to reply function, do not used in to chat',
  `conversation_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `subject` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.message_recipient:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_message_recipient` (
  `recipient_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `conversation_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `recipient_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `history_message_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'used to clear history function',
  `unread_count` smallint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `last_message_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `modified_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`conversation_id`,`recipient_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
